description: Ms. codex. Title from leaf 1a. Physical description: 23 lines per page; written in small naskh in black on glazed, laid European paper. Catchwords. Occasional staining. Leaves 324b-345b blank. Origin: Likely early 19th century. Incipit: الحمد لله الذي مهد لنا طريق اصلاح العمل ... فيقول ... هذا کتاب جمعت فيه مسائل الحلال و الحرام
author: Mujāhid, Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī, 1766 or 1767-1826 or 1827
extent: 345 leaves : paper ; 213 x 153 (155 x 94) mm bound to 213 x 155 mm
creator: Mujāhid, Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī, 1766 or 1767-1826 or 1827
مجاهد، محمد بن علي، 1766 or 1767-1826 or 1827

dlme_creator_ara_arab: مجاهد، محمد بن علي، 1766 or 1767-1826 or 1827
subject: Islamic law
binding_note: Full black leather with marbled paper doublures; back cover missing.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
